OSIR

OSIR module

OSIR.comma_separated_strings(value)[source]

Converts a comma-separated string into a list of strings, ensuring each item has a ‘.yml’ extension.

Parameters:

value (str) – Comma-separated string input from command line arguments.

Returns:

A list of strings, each potentially modified to end with ‘.yml’.

Return type:

list

OSIR.main()[source]

Main function that sets up and launches the monitoring and processing tasks based on command line arguments. This function orchestrates the entire process, from parsing arguments to setting up monitoring for case files and potentially starting Celery workers if running in agent mode.

OSIR.parse_args()[source]

Parses command line arguments to configure the processing environment and tasks.

Returns:

Namespace object containing the parsed command line arguments.

Return type:

argparse.Namespace
